2025-01-16.title: Reliance Profit Beats on Consumer Businesses, Resilient Oil
2025-01-16.description: Reliance Industries Ltd., controlled by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, posted a slightly better-than-expected quarterly profit, as gains from its telecom and retail units offset the volatility in its petrochemical business.

2025-03-03.title: Reliance Unit Risks India Fine in Rebuke for Ambani’s Empire
2025-03-03.description: A unit of billionaire Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Industries Ltd. risks being penalized after failing to set up a battery cell plant that formed part of Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s push to cut import dependence, according to people familiar with the …
